data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Larix sibirica (Siberian larch) from sample AKTALASI-61

Exposition SW, Slope 15 deg, Geology: Ranker/Gneis, Tree line 2500 m, av. Tree height 20 m, Tree cover 20%, Shrub cover 80%, Herb cover 40%, Moss cover 95%, Vegatation type: Lä-Arvenwald stark aufgelichtet, Film number: 1042A
